#labels linux,network
= server =

root ssh login has to be enabled and the following option has to be added into _/etc/ssh/sshd_config_

{{{
PermitTunnel ethernet
}}}

= client =

{{{
sudo ssh -w any -o Tunnel=ethernet root@hostname
}}}

= network configuration =

when the connection is established _/dev/tapX_ appears on both sides and has to be configured as any normal ethernet device.
